text.data:
Matelite: As captain of the knights of Kahna and commander of the Kahna Revival Unit... I, Royal Guard Matelite, hereby declare Campbell free!
Citizens of Campbell! From now on Campbell belongs to you![end]
Matelite: Huh...?[end]
Matelite: What's wrong, citizens of Campbell?![end]
Taicho: Matelite... that proclamation is for the queen to give.[end]
Matelite: That's right! Let's go to the castle![end]
[character][0x1]: I am... fine.[end]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragon Valitora is angry...[end]
Sendak: Princess... I understand... I can sense it a little as well.[end]
Sendak: Princess... I understand... I can sense it a little as well.[end]
[character][0x1]: Okay, let's return to [character][0x1].[end]
Queen Campbell: [character][0x1]! Everyone! Please wait![end]
Queen Campbell: I'll tell you after all...[end]
Matelite: What is it? We're kind of busy now.[end]
Queen Campbell: If I don't tell you, I will...[end]
Queen Campbell: I... knew about the legend of the Holy Dragons from the start...[end]

[0x24]The one who reads the minds of the Holy Dragons shall open the door to a new era.[0x22] And then of course there is something added to it...
[0x24]A weak-minded person shall summon forth a disaster from the heavens.[0x22][end]
Rush: [character][0x1]...[end]
The one who speaks with the Holy Dragons shall open the door to a new era.[end]
Understood, Captain [character][0x1].[end]
Weak-minded daughter of the king... Girl who knows of the legend... It all lies in your hands...[end]
Valitora... Please... leave... Please... let me go...[end]
I will not leave... Time will not come back... Be frightened... and suffer...[end]
Matelite: The one who reads the minds of the Holy Dragons... A door to a new era... What?! So then that means [character][0x1] is...![end]
Sendak: A weak-minded person? A disaster from the heavens?[end]
[character][0x1]: Stop! I don't want to know anything![end]
Matelite: Sendak! Why're you always thinking so pessimistically![end]

Sendak: I think I understand... Sauzer has taken over the world. But he knows about the legend. He knows that even by taking over the world, that isn't all there is. So that is why he wants the princess's power... No, he wants the power of the Kahna family line so he can use it to talk with the Holy Dragons...[end]
Sendak: But... it does not make sense. Why did Sauzer let her go?[end]
Matelite: He was scared of the power of [character][0x1] and the Holy Dragons! He gave up![end]
Queen Campbell: Sauzer is not the kind of person to give up on anything...[end]
[character][0x1]: ...[character][0x1]. Take me with you. I want to go back. It was nice together... I want to go back...[end]

Queen Campbell: [character][0x1]... You can't go back. If it were possible, I would want to go back in time, too... Back to when I knew nothing... Back to when I was a strong girl...
But that is a dream that will never come true...[end]
Joy, Nelbo... Go with those people. Help them as much as you possibly can. Will you do that for me?[end]
Joy: Of course, if that is Her Majesty's wish.[end]
Nelbo: Your Highness... Please take care.[end]

Queen Campbell: Joy, Nelbo. Thank you...
And... oh yes, please tell Sendak that if he is looking for the Holy Dragons, he should go to the water city of Mahal.[end]

I couldn't say it, after all... I'm... the weak-minded person... I was the one who told Sauzer about the legend... I had to in order to save Campbell.. No, I won't think that I can be forgiven... The destruction of Kahna... The death of King Kahna... And [character][0x1]'s pain... Oh, what will happen to us now...[end]
Sendak: [character][0x1]... The princess does not look well. Hurry and see the queen.[end]
Ah... so you're the dragon squad who defeated General Zomberd... Well done for someone so young.[end]
Thank you. Campbell has now returned to its former self.[end]
The generals and soldiers of the Granbelos Empire stayed here. Even Emperor Sauzer came.[end]
General Palpaleos was nice. He told me to become a strong man! Heheh![end]
I saw Emperor Sauzer before! He was cool![end]
We got used to having Imperial soldiers walking around, so now it seems a little strange.[end]
Rush: None of those Empire jerks are here![end]
Truce: We're keeping watch to make sure the Imperial Army doesn't come back. This was Rush's idea. He too has become an excellent soldier.[end]
Rush: Stop! You're embarrassing me![end]
Truce: Captain [character][0x1]. Please tell me when you want to return to [character][0x1].[end]
Stay a little longer Go to [character][0x1][end1]
I don't think we've ever been to Campbell before. Is there anything that interests you?[end]
Let's see, the ones still here are...[end]
Matelite: Huh? Are we going back?[end]
[character][0x1]: I'm sorry... We came all the way to Campbell for nothing...[end]
Truce: Captain...[end]
You got a Life Grass.[end]
You got a Sweet Honey.[end]
You got a Poison Mushroom.[end]
You got some Uniuji.[end]
You got a HialSP.[end][end]
